What will you do... kill them?"},{"lineNumber":263825,"originalJapaneseLine":"そうだね、邪魔な連中だから寝ているうちに殺してしまおう。","translatedEnglishLine":"That's right, they’re pesky, so let's kill them while they’re asleep."},{"lineNumber":263826,"originalJapaneseLine":"ぐさっ","translatedEnglishLine":"*stab*"},{"lineNumber":263827,"originalJapaneseLine":"＜ゲームオーバー＞","translatedEnglishLine":"<Game Over>"},{"lineNumber":263828,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦闘中の割り込みイベント","translatedEnglishLine":"Interruption event during battle."},{"lineNumber":263829,"originalJapaneseLine":"まだ起きている・・どうなっている、しかたない","translatedEnglishLine":"Still awake... what's going on? It can't be helped."},{"lineNumber":263830,"originalJapaneseLine":"とチラッと少し服を脱ぐ","translatedEnglishLine":"They glance and begin to take off a bit of clothing."},{"lineNumber":263831,"originalJapaneseLine":"もわわーん、さらにワーグ臭が広がった","translatedEnglishLine":"Mmmm, the Warg stench spreads even more."},{"lineNumber":263832,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦闘中の割り込みイベント","translatedEnglishLine":"Interruption event during battle."},{"lineNumber":263833,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんだ抵抗しないのか、よーし、俺様に降参だな","translatedEnglishLine":"What, no resistance? Alright, you surrender to me then."},{"lineNumber":263834,"originalJapaneseLine":"降参なんかしないわよ、しかたない・・さらに服を脱ぐ","translatedEnglishLine":"I won’t surrender! Fine... then I’ll take off more clothes."},{"lineNumber":263835,"originalJapaneseLine":"コートを取った、ワーグ臭が広がる","translatedEnglishLine":"She removes her coat; the Warg odor spreads."},{"lineNumber":263836,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・う、ランスがパタンと倒れる","translatedEnglishLine":"...Uh, Rance suddenly collapses."},{"lineNumber":263837,"originalJapaneseLine":"が、起き上がる・・・ぐっ・・女の子が俺様の為にサービスでストリップをしている","translatedEnglishLine":"But he gets back up... ugh... a girl is performing a strip show as a service for me."},{"lineNumber":263838,"originalJapaneseLine":"見なければ・・・しかし、どうしてそんなサービスを","translatedEnglishLine":"I mustn't look... but why such a service?"},{"lineNumber":263839,"originalJapaneseLine":"違うわよ、私の力は周囲を眠らせる体臭・・普段は強すぎるから厚着で防いでいるの","translatedEnglishLine":"No, it’s different. My power is a body odor that makes everyone nearby sleepy... Normally it’s too strong, so I wear thick clothes to block it."},{"lineNumber":263840,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦闘中の割り込みイベント","translatedEnglishLine":"Interruption event during battle."},{"lineNumber":263841,"originalJapaneseLine":"どうした、俺様は眠くならないぞ・・と（内心必死）","translatedEnglishLine":"What’s wrong? I’m not getting sleepy... (desperately thinking inside)."},{"lineNumber":263842,"originalJapaneseLine":"もっと脱がないと駄目じゃないかな、くくくく","translatedEnglishLine":"You have to take off more clothes, don’t you? Hehehe."},{"lineNumber":263843,"originalJapaneseLine":"この・・・と脱ぎます。","translatedEnglishLine":"I’ll take these off... and do so."},{"lineNumber":263844,"originalJapaneseLine":"さらにあふれるワーグ臭・・　ぐはっ、これはきつい・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Even more Warg stench overflows... gah, this is tough..."},{"lineNumber":263845,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦闘中の割り込みイベント","translatedEnglishLine":"Interruption event during battle."},{"lineNumber":263846,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・・・なに、どうして","translatedEnglishLine":"...What? Why?"},{"lineNumber":263847,"originalJapaneseLine":"ぐふふふふふ、とエロ意識だけでなんとか起きているランス","translatedEnglishLine":"Gufufufufu, Rance manages to stay awake through erotic awareness alone."},{"lineNumber":263848,"originalJapaneseLine":"いやらしい手つきで迫ってくる","translatedEnglishLine":"Approaching with lascivious movements."},{"lineNumber":263849,"originalJapaneseLine":"くっ・・と恥ずかしいが下着も脱ぎます。","translatedEnglishLine":"Ugh... embarrassed, but takes off underwear too."},{"lineNumber":263850,"originalJapaneseLine":"ついにラッシーも寝てしまった","translatedEnglishLine":"Finally, Lassie also falls asleep."},{"lineNumber":263851,"originalJapaneseLine":"メモ：ワーグの脱ぎ段階はフラグで後で渡します。","translatedEnglishLine":"Note: The Warg’s clothing removal stages will be given later by flags."},{"lineNumber":263852,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":263853,"originalJapaneseLine":"ワーグ臭に耐えて、ふらふらと迫るランス","translatedEnglishLine":"Enduring the Warg stench, Rance staggers forward."},{"lineNumber":263854,"originalJapaneseLine":"うそ・・どうして、あわわ・・とよろけ倒れて腰をついてしまう","translatedEnglishLine":"No way... why? Whoa... he stumbles and falls to his knees."},{"lineNumber":263855,"originalJapaneseLine":"ワーグの中にフラッシュバック","translatedEnglishLine":"Flashback to time among the Wargs."},{"lineNumber":263856,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ケイブリスに殴られた恐怖が蘇る。","translatedEnglishLine":"The fear of being hit by Cave Ris resurfaces."},{"lineNumber":263857,"originalJapaneseLine":"　このアマ、つけあがるなと壁まで吹き飛ばされた暴力","translatedEnglishLine":"This woman, don’t get cocky—the violence that sent me flying to the wall."},{"lineNumber":263858,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こわい、こわい、恐怖で竦んでしまう","translatedEnglishLine":"Scared, scared, frozen with fear."},{"lineNumber":263859,"originalJapaneseLine":"殺される・・と頭を抱えた","translatedEnglishLine":"Thinking 'I'm going to be killed...' he holds his head."},{"lineNumber":263860,"originalJapaneseLine":"だが、ランスはワーグの側によるとカオスを放り投げ","translatedEnglishLine":"But when Rance approaches the Warg, he throws Chaos away."},{"lineNumber":263861,"originalJapaneseLine":"抱きしめる、よーし、降参だな、降参だな、俺様の勝ちだ。頭なでなで","translatedEnglishLine":"He embraces her, 'Alright, you surrender, you surrender, I win.' pats her head."},{"lineNumber":263862,"originalJapaneseLine":"えっ・・殺さないの","translatedEnglishLine":"Eh... you won’t kill me?"},{"lineNumber":263863,"originalJapaneseLine":"当たり前だ、俺は可愛い女の子の味方だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Of course not, I'm on the side of cute girls."},{"lineNumber":263864,"originalJapaneseLine":"悪かったな・・攻撃して、だが、殴ったのはそのふわふわだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Sorry about attacking you... but it was that fluff who punched."},{"lineNumber":263865,"originalJapaneseLine":"うん知っていた、ラッシーだけ殴られた・・私は・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Yeah, I knew that, only Lassie got hit... I..."},{"lineNumber":263866,"originalJapaneseLine":"ああ・・駄目だ、せっかく君みたいな可愛い子とお友達になって、これから","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah... no good, I finally made friends with a cute girl like you, and from now on"},{"lineNumber":263867,"originalJapaneseLine":"楽しい事をしようと思っていたのだが・・眠い・・ちょっと寝るわ・・","translatedEnglishLine":"I was thinking of having fun... but I'm sleepy... I'll take a little nap..."},{"lineNumber":263868,"originalJapaneseLine":"起きたらお茶しよう、どこにも行くなよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"When I wake up, let’s have tea, don’t go anywhere."},{"lineNumber":263869,"originalJapaneseLine":"ぐーーー寝てしまう","translatedEnglishLine":"Guuu— he falls asleep."},{"lineNumber":263870,"originalJapaneseLine":"ラッシーが言う、すごい人間だな・・　","translatedEnglishLine":"Lassie says, 'What an amazing human...'"},{"lineNumber":263871,"originalJapaneseLine":"お前を殺す為でなく、仲良くしたいが為にここまで耐えたのか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"He endured this much not to kill you, but because he wanted to be friends..."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょ、ちょっと待て、倒れた奴が多いから部隊編成をさせろ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: W-Wait a moment, since many have fallen, let me organize the squad.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うん、わかった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yeah, understood.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスも眠いですが戦う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance is sleepy too, but he'll fight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦うの？　ラッシーはやる気まんまん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Fighting? Lassie is totally motivated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 眠ってほしいんだけどな・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I wish he'd just fall asleep though...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Battle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このイベントは、ワーグに近寄る途中、ワーグとの戦闘前、ワーグとの戦闘後の
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This event occurs either while approaching the Warg, before battle with the Warg, or after battle with the Warg,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どれかの状態でランスが眠ってしまった場合に発生します
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: if Rance falls asleep in any of these states.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス・・うう・・駄目だ、ねむい・・ばたん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance... ugh... no good, I'm sleepy... *collapse*

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・暗転
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Screen goes dark.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこにワーグ（服を着ている）、そこにケイブワン、ケイブニャンが現れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There appears a clothed Warg, alongside Cave One and Cave Nyan.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よくやったと褒める、どうする・・殺す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They praise 'Well done.' What will you do... kill them?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうだね、邪魔な連中だから寝ているうちに殺してしまおう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's right, they’re pesky, so let's kill them while they’re asleep.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぐさっ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: *stab*

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜ゲームオーバー＞
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: <Game Over>

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘中の割り込みイベント
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Interruption event during battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだ起きている・・どうなっている、しかたない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Still awake... what's going on? It can't be helped.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とチラッと少し服を脱ぐ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They glance and begin to take off a bit of clothing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もわわーん、さらにワーグ臭が広がった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mmmm, the Warg stench spreads even more.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘中の割り込みイベント
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Interruption event during battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだ抵抗しないのか、よーし、俺様に降参だな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What, no resistance? Alright, you surrender to me then.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 降参なんかしないわよ、しかたない・・さらに服を脱ぐ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I won’t surrender! Fine... then I’ll take off more clothes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コートを取った、ワーグ臭が広がる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She removes her coat; the Warg odor spreads.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・う、ランスがパタンと倒れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Uh, Rance suddenly collapses.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: が、起き上がる・・・ぐっ・・女の子が俺様の為にサービスでストリップをしている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But he gets back up... ugh... a girl is performing a strip show as a service for me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 見なければ・・・しかし、どうしてそんなサービスを
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I mustn't look... but why such a service?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 違うわよ、私の力は周囲を眠らせる体臭・・普段は強すぎるから厚着で防いでいるの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, it’s different. My power is a body odor that makes everyone nearby sleepy... Normally it’s too strong, so I wear thick clothes to block it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘中の割り込みイベント
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Interruption event during battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうした、俺様は眠くならないぞ・・と（内心必死）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What’s wrong? I’m not getting sleepy... (desperately thinking inside).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もっと脱がないと駄目じゃないかな、くくくく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You have to take off more clothes, don’t you? Hehehe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この・・・と脱ぎます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’ll take these off... and do so.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さらにあふれるワーグ臭・・　ぐはっ、これはきつい・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even more Warg stench overflows... gah, this is tough...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘中の割り込みイベント
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Interruption event during battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・・・なに、どうして
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...What? Why?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぐふふふふふ、とエロ意識だけでなんとか起きているランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gufufufufu, Rance manages to stay awake through erotic awareness alone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いやらしい手つきで迫ってくる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Approaching with lascivious movements.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: くっ・・と恥ずかしいが下着も脱ぎます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh... embarrassed, but takes off underwear too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ついにラッシーも寝てしまった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Finally, Lassie also falls asleep.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メモ：ワーグの脱ぎ段階はフラグで後で渡します。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Note: The Warg’s clothing removal stages will be given later by flags.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ワーグ臭に耐えて、ふらふらと迫るランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Enduring the Warg stench, Rance staggers forward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うそ・・どうして、あわわ・・とよろけ倒れて腰をついてしまう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No way... why? Whoa... he stumbles and falls to his knees.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ワーグの中にフラッシュバック
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Flashback to time among the Wargs.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスに殴られた恐怖が蘇る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The fear of being hit by Cave Ris resurfaces.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このアマ、つけあがるなと壁まで吹き飛ばされた暴力
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This woman, don’t get cocky—the violence that sent me flying to the wall.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こわい、こわい、恐怖で竦んでしまう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Scared, scared, frozen with fear.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 殺される・・と頭を抱えた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thinking 'I'm going to be killed...' he holds his head.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、ランスはワーグの側によるとカオスを放り投げ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But when Rance approaches the Warg, he throws Chaos away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 抱きしめる、よーし、降参だな、降参だな、俺様の勝ちだ。頭なでなで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He embraces her, 'Alright, you surrender, you surrender, I win.' pats her head.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えっ・・殺さないの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Eh... you won’t kill me?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 当たり前だ、俺は可愛い女の子の味方だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Of course not, I'm on the side of cute girls.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 悪かったな・・攻撃して、だが、殴ったのはそのふわふわだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sorry about attacking you... but it was that fluff who punched.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うん知っていた、ラッシーだけ殴られた・・私は・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yeah, I knew that, only Lassie got hit... I...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ああ・・駄目だ、せっかく君みたいな可愛い子とお友達になって、これから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah... no good, I finally made friends with a cute girl like you, and from now on

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 楽しい事をしようと思っていたのだが・・眠い・・ちょっと寝るわ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was thinking of having fun... but I'm sleepy... I'll take a little nap...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 起きたらお茶しよう、どこにも行くなよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When I wake up, let’s have tea, don’t go anywhere.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぐーーー寝てしまう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Guuu— he falls asleep.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ラッシーが言う、すごい人間だな・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lassie says, 'What an amazing human...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前を殺す為でなく、仲良くしたいが為にここまで耐えたのか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He endured this much not to kill you, but because he wanted to be friends...

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょ、ちょっと待て、倒れた奴が多いから部隊編成をさせろ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: W-Wait a moment, since many have fallen, let me organize the squad.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うん、わかった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yeah, understood.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスも眠いですが戦う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance is sleepy too, but he'll fight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦うの？　ラッシーはやる気まんまん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Fighting? Lassie is totally motivated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 眠ってほしいんだけどな・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I wish he'd just fall asleep though...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Battle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このイベントは、ワーグに近寄る途中、ワーグとの戦闘前、ワーグとの戦闘後の
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This event occurs either while approaching the Warg, before battle with the Warg, or after battle with the Warg,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どれかの状態でランスが眠ってしまった場合に発生します
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: if Rance falls asleep in any of these states.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス・・うう・・駄目だ、ねむい・・ばたん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance... ugh... no good, I'm sleepy... *collapse*

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・暗転
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Screen goes dark.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこにワーグ（服を着ている）、そこにケイブワン、ケイブニャンが現れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There appears a clothed Warg, alongside Cave One and Cave Nyan.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よくやったと褒める、どうする・・殺す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They praise 'Well done.' What will you do... kill them?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうだね、邪魔な連中だから寝ているうちに殺してしまおう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's right, they’re pesky, so let's kill them while they’re asleep.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぐさっ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: *stab*

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜ゲームオーバー＞
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: <Game Over>

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘中の割り込みイベント
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Interruption event during battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだ起きている・・どうなっている、しかたない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Still awake... what's going on? It can't be helped.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とチラッと少し服を脱ぐ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They glance and begin to take off a bit of clothing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もわわーん、さらにワーグ臭が広がった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mmmm, the Warg stench spreads even more.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘中の割り込みイベント
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Interruption event during battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだ抵抗しないのか、よーし、俺様に降参だな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What, no resistance? Alright, you surrender to me then.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 降参なんかしないわよ、しかたない・・さらに服を脱ぐ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I won’t surrender! Fine... then I’ll take off more clothes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コートを取った、ワーグ臭が広がる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She removes her coat; the Warg odor spreads.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・う、ランスがパタンと倒れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Uh, Rance suddenly collapses.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: が、起き上がる・・・ぐっ・・女の子が俺様の為にサービスでストリップをしている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But he gets back up... ugh... a girl is performing a strip show as a service for me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 見なければ・・・しかし、どうしてそんなサービスを
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I mustn't look... but why such a service?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 違うわよ、私の力は周囲を眠らせる体臭・・普段は強すぎるから厚着で防いでいるの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, it’s different. My power is a body odor that makes everyone nearby sleepy... Normally it’s too strong, so I wear thick clothes to block it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘中の割り込みイベント
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Interruption event during battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうした、俺様は眠くならないぞ・・と（内心必死）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What’s wrong? I’m not getting sleepy... (desperately thinking inside).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もっと脱がないと駄目じゃないかな、くくくく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You have to take off more clothes, don’t you? Hehehe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この・・・と脱ぎます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’ll take these off... and do so.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さらにあふれるワーグ臭・・　ぐはっ、これはきつい・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even more Warg stench overflows... gah, this is tough...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘中の割り込みイベント
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Interruption event during battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・・・なに、どうして
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...What? Why?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぐふふふふふ、とエロ意識だけでなんとか起きているランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gufufufufu, Rance manages to stay awake through erotic awareness alone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いやらしい手つきで迫ってくる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Approaching with lascivious movements.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: くっ・・と恥ずかしいが下着も脱ぎます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh... embarrassed, but takes off underwear too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ついにラッシーも寝てしまった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Finally, Lassie also falls asleep.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メモ：ワーグの脱ぎ段階はフラグで後で渡します。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Note: The Warg’s clothing removal stages will be given later by flags.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ワーグ臭に耐えて、ふらふらと迫るランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Enduring the Warg stench, Rance staggers forward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うそ・・どうして、あわわ・・とよろけ倒れて腰をついてしまう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No way... why? Whoa... he stumbles and falls to his knees.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ワーグの中にフラッシュバック
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Flashback to time among the Wargs.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスに殴られた恐怖が蘇る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The fear of being hit by Cave Ris resurfaces.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このアマ、つけあがるなと壁まで吹き飛ばされた暴力
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This woman, don’t get cocky—the violence that sent me flying to the wall.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こわい、こわい、恐怖で竦んでしまう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Scared, scared, frozen with fear.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 殺される・・と頭を抱えた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thinking 'I'm going to be killed...' he holds his head.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、ランスはワーグの側によるとカオスを放り投げ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But when Rance approaches the Warg, he throws Chaos away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 抱きしめる、よーし、降参だな、降参だな、俺様の勝ちだ。頭なでなで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He embraces her, 'Alright, you surrender, you surrender, I win.' pats her head.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えっ・・殺さないの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Eh... you won’t kill me?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 当たり前だ、俺は可愛い女の子の味方だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Of course not, I'm on the side of cute girls.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 悪かったな・・攻撃して、だが、殴ったのはそのふわふわだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sorry about attacking you... but it was that fluff who punched.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うん知っていた、ラッシーだけ殴られた・・私は・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yeah, I knew that, only Lassie got hit... I...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ああ・・駄目だ、せっかく君みたいな可愛い子とお友達になって、これから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah... no good, I finally made friends with a cute girl like you, and from now on

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 楽しい事をしようと思っていたのだが・・眠い・・ちょっと寝るわ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was thinking of having fun... but I'm sleepy... I'll take a little nap...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 起きたらお茶しよう、どこにも行くなよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When I wake up, let’s have tea, don’t go anywhere.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぐーーー寝てしまう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Guuu— he falls asleep.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ラッシーが言う、すごい人間だな・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lassie says, 'What an amazing human...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前を殺す為でなく、仲良くしたいが為にここまで耐えたのか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He endured this much not to kill you, but because he wanted to be friends...
